show_name: Eroge! H mo Game mo Kaihatsu Zanmai (OAV)
other_title: えろげー！ ～Hもゲームも開発三昧～ (Japanese)
plot: The erotic game company Flower is in danger of being closed because their first two games have not sold very well. For their third game Tomoya Mochizuki, an erotic game connoisseur, has been hired to teach the all female staff of Flower a thing or two about eroticism.
